price: Ai e pranon pendimin e robërve të Vet, i fal gjynahet dhe i di të gjitha çfarë punoni ju.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي يَقۡبَلُ ٱلتَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَعۡفُواْ عَنِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī yaqbalu al-tawbata ʿan ʿibādihi wayaʿfū ʿani al-sayiāti wayaʿlamu mā tafʿalūna
